name: ETWInfinity
description: ETWInfinity is the Gaming platform of ETXInfinity, ETW is a utility token for the ETX eco gaming platform, mainly used for platform governance, rewards, destruction, nft minting. etc. We release the first game on ETX Mainnet -- Watch to earn. You can stake ETW to get in watch to earn dapp. And we always keep your token safe, the only fee is taken by the profit you get. We both activate the user and the creator. ETW is jumping to ETX Mainnet which the latest web3 and Blockchain 2.0 ETW is the only governance to manage the Gaming platform.
